additional-note: All the CCE contribution renewals specifically mentioning the Buffalo Times are in the This Week section.  This Week was a Sunday supplement that was included in multiple newspapers, and that had its own issue and contribution copyright renewals, beginning in 1935.  See its copyright information page for more details.
